title: NEURA Robotics partners with Bosch to advance German-made robotics
description:
NEURA Robotics and Bosch plan to co-develop AI-based core and functional software, as well as intuitive user interfaces.

The post NEURA Robotics partners with Bosch to advance German-made robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
